00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "StdDevTemplate.hpp"
00035 #include "QualityMetric.hpp"
00036 #include "MsqError.hpp"

00040 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00041 
00042 ObjectiveFunction* StdDevTemplate::clone() const
00043   { return new StdDevTemplate(*this); }
00044 
00045 bool StdDevTemplate::evaluate( EvalType type, 
00046                                PatchData& pd,
00047                                double& value_out,
00048                                bool free,
00049                                MsqError& err )
00050 {
00051   bool result = VarianceTemplate::evaluate( type, pd, value_out, free, err );
00052   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00053     return false;
00054   
00055   const double neg = get_quality_metric()->get_negate_flag();
00056   value_out = neg * sqrt( neg * value_out );
00057   return true;
00058 }
00059 
00060 bool StdDevTemplate::evaluate_with_gradient( EvalType type, 
00061                                              PatchData& pd,
00062                                              double& value_out,
00063                                              std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00064                                              MsqError& err )
00065 {
00066   bool result = VarianceTemplate::evaluate_with_gradient( type, pd, value_out, grad_out, err );
00067   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00068     return false;
00069   
00070   const double neg = get_quality_metric()->get_negate_flag();
00071   value_out *= neg; // undo any negation done by VarianceTemplate
00072   value_out = sqrt( value_out ); // standard deviation
00073   const double factor = 1.0/(2.0 * value_out);  
00074   for (std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator i = grad_out.begin(); i != grad_out.end(); ++i)
00075     *i *= factor;
00076   value_out *= neg; // redo any negation done by VariandeTemplate
00077   
00078   return true;
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 bool StdDevTemplate::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( EvalType type, 
00083                                         PatchData& pd,
00084                                         double& value_out,
00085                                         std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00086                                         std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& hess_diag_out,
00087                                         MsqError& err )
00088 {
00089   bool result = VarianceTemplate::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( type, pd, value_out, grad_out, hess_diag_out, err );
00090   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00091     return false;
00092   
00093   const double neg = get_quality_metric()->get_negate_flag();
00094   value_out *= neg; // undo any negation done by VarianceTemplate
00095   value_out = sqrt( value_out ); // standard deviation
00096   const double f1 = 1.0/(2.0 * value_out);
00097   const double f2 = neg * -0.25 / (value_out * value_out * value_out);
00098   for (size_t i = 0; i < grad_out.size(); ++i) {
00099     hess_diag_out[i] *= f1;
00100     hess_diag_out[i] += f2 * outer( grad_out[i] );
00101     grad_out[i] *= f1;
00102   }
00103   
00104   value_out *= neg; // redo any negation done by VariandeTemplate
00105   return true;
00106 }
